title: MyLangTools
description: A language tool website that serves as a Dictionary, Thesaurus, and Translator. Users can search up the definition of a word, retrieve a list of synonyms and antonyms, or translate text!

title: Workout Manager
description: An Android app that helps manage workouts, with features for registering and logging in to save progress. Users can create/edit/delete exercises, and track workouts based on the number of remanining sets!

title: Memory Card Game
description: An Android app for a typical memory matching card game. Users must match all pairs of cards in order to win. The app comes with an easy mode (small board) and a hard mode (lagre board)!

title: Wynny
description: A Discord chatbot that has commands to send pictures of dogs and cats (with fun facts), tell jokes, and give fortunes. It also comes with an 8ball feature (answering yes/no questions)!
